IMO putting things away needs to be done by the person using the object. Chores, on the other hand, can and SHOULD be a child's job. Doing the dishes should never be the person who cooked dinners job. The child should be given an easy list to begin with and as they get older it should get harder. Chores prepare you for the real world. What you see as lazy now might change. It might not but always keep an open mind about keeping the house clean
If you feel you're being taken advantage of, sit your parents down and CALMLY tell them what you feel is wrong. Make a list of your expected chores and don't complain if they add a small job. JUST DO IT
